entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
